comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Rebecca Shelley (1887 - 1984) was an American pacifist, see chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045487/1915-10-30/ed-... www.jstor.org/discover/10.5342/michhistrevi.36.1.71?uid=3... In November 1915, she received a check for $ 10'000 from Clara Jane Bryant Ford (Mrs. Henry Ford) to cover the expense of a telegraph canvass of all woman's societies to further mother's day and worlds peace and delivered it to Jane Addams, president of the organization. The sun., November 23, 1915, Page 4, first column: "$ 10,000 FROM MRS. FORD" Mrs. Henry Ford:
